def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition if widget.Entity == None: return
widget.View.Commands["CMD_LOG"].Enabled = widget.Entity.Log != None widget.View.Commands["OPERACOESFISCAIS"].Visible = widget.Entity.PermitirLancamentoComplementoOperacoesFiscais() widget.View.Commands["CMD_EDITAR"].Visible = widget.View.Commands["Confirmar"].Visible widget.View.Commands["CMD_SELECIONARCONTA"].Visible = widget.View.Commands["Confirmar"].Visible
registro = widget.Entity botaoObservacoesLancFiscaisVisible = registro.BotaoObservacaoLancamentosFiscaisVisible() if (not botaoObservacoesLancFiscaisVisible): widget.View.Commands["GRP_COMANDOS"].Items["CMD_LANCAMENTOOBSFISCAIS"].Visible = False
botaoObservacoesVisible = registro.BotaoObservacoesVisible() if(not botaoObservacoesVisible): widget.View.Commands["GRP_COMANDOS"].Items["CMD_OBSERVACOES"].Visible = False
botaoSpedGasEnergiaVisible = registro.BotaoSpedGasEnergiaVisible() if (not botaoSpedGasEnergiaVisible): if widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_GASENERGIAAGUA"] != None: widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_GASENERGIAAGUA"].Visible = False
botaoSpedComunicacaoTelecomunicacaoVisible = registro.BotaoSpedComunicacaoVisible() if (not botaoSpedComunicacaoTelecomunicacaoVisible): if widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_COMUNICACAOTELECOMUNICACAO"] != None: widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_COMUNICACAOTELECOMUNICACAO"].Visible = False
